entities.name: black
entities.description: The Black family's noble and ancient house is mentioned as a place of significance.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is the location where Harry lives with his relatives.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a member of the Black family and is mentioned as having a connection to Privet Drive.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the Secret-Keeper for the Order and has added protection to Privet Drive.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as showing a note from Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Sirius is a member of the Black family.
Dumbledore has added protection to Privet Drive.
Moody showed a note from Dumbledore.
